  17. (* Run-time library for profiled programs *)

  19. ‌type profiling_counters = (string * (string * int array)) list

  21. ‌let counters = ref ([] : profiling_counters)
  22. ‌let incr a i = a.(i) <- a.(i) + 1

  24. exception Bad_profile

  26. ‌let dump_counters () =
  27.   let dumpfile =
  28.     try Sys.getenv "OCAMLPROF_DUMP" with Not_found -> "ocamlprof.dump"
  29.   in
  30.   begin try
  31.     let ic = open_in_bin dumpfile in
  32.     let prevl = (input_value ic : profiling_counters) in
  33.     close_in ic;
  34.     List.iter2
  35.       (fun (curname, (curmodes,curcount)) (prevname, (prevmodes,prevcount)) ->
  36.         if curname <> prevname
  37.         || curmodes <> prevmodes
  38.         || Array.length curcount <> Array.length prevcount
  39.         then raise Bad_profile)
  40.       !counters prevl;
  41.     List.iter2
  42.       (fun (_curname, (_,curcount)) (_prevname, (_,prevcount)) ->
  43.         for i = 0 to Array.length curcount - 1 do
  44.           curcount.(i) <- curcount.(i) + prevcount.(i)
  45.         done)
  46.       !counters prevl
  47.   with _ -> ()
  48.   end;
  49.   begin try
  50.     let oc = open_out_bin dumpfile in
  51.     output_value oc !counters;
  52.     close_out oc
  53.   with _ -> ()
  54.   end

  56. let _ = at_exit dump_counters
